Reference

All functions

is_dolt_installed() dolt_version() dolt_path()

Find and check for the presence of a dolt binary

dolt_config_get() dolt_config_set()

Get and set Dolt configuration variables

dolt_remote() dbUnloadDriver(<DoltDriver>) show(<DoltDriver>) dbConnect(<DoltDriver>)

Connect to a dolt database

dolt_diffs() dolt_table_history()

Examine information about dolt tables and diffs

dbGetInfo(<DoltConnection>) show(<DoltConnection>)

Get information about a Dolt Database

dbSendQuery(<DoltConnection>,<character>) dbSendStatement(<DoltConnection>,<character>) dbClearResult(<DoltResult>) dbDisconnect(<DoltConnection>)

Miscellaneous Dolt Methods

dolt_checkout() dolt_use()

Navigate dolt history

dbReadTable(<DoltConnection>,<character>) dbListTables(<DoltConnection>) dbListObjects(<DoltConnection>) dbExistsTable(<DoltConnection>,<character>)

Reading from a Dolt database.

dolt_push() dolt_pull() dolt_fetch() dolt_clone()

Work with dolt repository remotes

dolt_add() dolt_commit() dolt_reset()

Add, commit, and reset tables in a dolt database

dolt_state() dolt_status() dolt_last_commit()

Get information about a dolt database

dolt_branches() dolt_remotes() dolt_docs() dolt_log()

Dolt System Tables

dbDataType(<DoltConnection>) dolt_type_sizes()

Dolt Data Types

dolt-vars

Configuration variable options

dbWriteTable(<DoltConnection>,<character>,<data.frame>)

Write a table to the database

dolt()

Return a (cached) connection to the default Dolt database

dolt_dump()

Export data from a dolt database

dolt_init()

Initiate a dolt database directory

dolt_local() dbUnloadDriver(<DoltLocalDriver>) show(<DoltLocalDriver>) dbConnect(<DoltLocalDriver>) dbGetInfo(<DoltLocalConnection>) show(<DoltLocalConnection>) dbDisconnect(<DoltLocalConnection>) dbIsValid(<DoltLocalConnection>)

Connect to a local dolt database directory

dolt_pane() update_dolt_pane() close_dolt_pane()

Open a Dolt connection pane in RStudio

dolt_server()

Start up a dolt SQL server and return the server process handle
